name: FishAndWeapons
description:
You have three missions:

Get the coin

Buy your weapon

Destroy all the crates

CONTROLS:

AWSD or arrow keys to move.

E to interact (get the coin and buy the weapon)

Tab to show missions menu

Left Mouse Button to shoot

Escape to exit game

Made thanks to the good teaching techniques of Jonathan and Carlos, authorized Unity tutors:

https://www.udemy.com/user/jonathan-weinberger/

https://www.udemy.com/user/557b4a9ed200a/

https://www.udemy.com/the-ultimate-guide-to-game-development-with-unity/

https://www.udemy.com/la-guia-definitiva-del-desarrollo-de-videojuegos-con-unity...

Author: Yone Moreno Jimenez
